flawed_nl_solution:
The number of customers who were served coffee in the restaurant is 3/5*25 = <<3/5*25=125/3>>125/3
If the total number of customers who came to the restaurant was 25, then 25-125/3 = <<25-125/3=-50/3>>-50/3 customers did not buy coffee

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 125/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
